reviews.review: Definitely one of the best co-op games! Music, gore, maps, graphics.. all top-quality stuff. A must-have game for anyone enjoying fragging pathetic-specimens-gone-wrong.

This game is very solid. The gameplay is thoroughly enjoyable and at the time of this recommendation I have 230hours logged into this, 109/176 chieves. This game is not similar to Left 4 Dead, it is a closed arena survival game, not a point a-to-point b design. The game is extremely, extremely difficult on higher difficulties that cannot be overcome without amazing team work and skill. You can view the % complete of the Suicidal and Hell on Earth difficulty for some levels and they will attest to the replayability. Kudos if you pick this up, hit me up for a game!
Probably the best horror survival game ever. New content doesn't cost you a nickle, only some of the skins have a very small pricetag.
It's raining money!

Great game if you like a survival horror game with tons of gore.

Counterstrike is for pussies. Real men play Killing Floor. It's a satisfying FPS game that has lots of gorey giblets. Cash per kill, perks, zombies, holiday mayhem throughout the year, slow motion murder fun in Zed Time. What is not to love about this game?
You never get bored killing Mutants, but if you do so, change perk/wpns and go on! :D With some friends even better ;)
Recommending for who loves Action and Horror and blood :D

What can you say about a game from 2009, a mod of UT2004 before that even, that's compared to Left 4 Dead 2 with people saying it's better than Dead Island?
   Pros
   - Weapons, perks, zombies...
   - Lots of maps.
   - Events around the year.
   - Some funny zombies, when did you hear that last about a survival shooter?
   Cons
   - On harder difficulties 1 or 2 careless players can bring the death of the rest.
   - Some bugs and glitches to be exploited but they're always working on that.
   - Can get a bit slow at times like if you're just guarding or welding the door behind a long corridor...
   - Only 1 game mode.

Отличный кооперативный сурвайвбл-зомби-шутер. Игра, вышедшая с коленок любителей и мода для UT2004 с вкраплением bullet-time'а (здешнее ZED-time - ноу-хау для сетевых пострелушек, активируемое в моменты отстрела башки здоровенным бугаям) за несколько лет превратилась в эпохальное шествие по жаждущим веселья головам игроков со всего мира! Из минусов можно отметить отсутствие сюжетной кампании, но это лишь придаёт шарму - настроение на следующие пол-часа задаёт коротакая присказка-брифинг перед стартом каждой карты. Зато к геймплею нет никаких вопросов - 6 полноценных классов на выбор, с возможностью "качать циферки" и невероятным простором для тактической мысли. Комбинирование классов в команде, выбор позиции и её защита всеми подручными способами - от дробовика с огнёметом до небольшого сварочного аппарата, которым можно удержать несколько десятков зомби на другой стороне... Но они всё-равно найдут вас ещё до рассвета! ^^

one of my fave (zombie) shooters and a huge emphasis on teamplay and heavy punishments with failure to do so. also a well-polished, balanced and pretty much a final product with a huge community and continuous love from the dev team.

if you love co-op and want a shooter that takes time, patience and dedication to master, then don't skip on this title!

One of the better if not the best single and multiplayer games. UT and Q3A style arena match with a co-op twist. You don't battle against other players. Instead, you play with them, against hordes of progressively harder waves of monsters. There are different classes, different weapons, RPG elements where you slowly evolve your characters etc. Not 2 games are ever the same and new content on special events always refreshes the game value, It's old but because of that, it's still very interesting and alive, there are loads of players still playing it all the time, not just on weekends or late in the evening. Something you don't see even in much newer games.

I've been hesitating to buy this game at first, wasn't sure if i'd like it. Man, i was then sorry i didn't buy it sooner. It has it's bugs and glitches, but sometimes, they are so hilarious they actually improve the game. I remember countless times we were laughing like crazy when monsters went crazy and did something stupid. Those moments were priceless.

THE best co-op shooter you'll ever play. Enough said.

In the new adaptation of the Left 4 Dead series, a new gang find themselves stranded in the UK, left for dead. It is up to the odd quad to fight against the undead and make it to safety!

As the third game in the series, my expectations were really high, considering the success of the first two. And I must say, I really am impressed. With the new cast of witty British men, Left 4 Dead takes the series to unprecedented heights.

Remember that scene in Aliens where the Marines had to hole-up, defend their positions from Aliens that came out of every nook and cranny, eventually leading to a fight on the move as they tried to get to the exit? Killing Floor gameplay is basically that with up to 6 players (difficulty /kinda/ scales with more players). In contrast to L4D multiplayer, instead of a SPRINT to the exit (especially in Versus mode), you are often better off finding a good, defensible position and making the best of it for as long as you can. There are multiple classes and there is a decent "RPG" system, allowing you to unlock abilities over time. The Metacritic review does NOT do this game justice - Killing Floor is a solid multiplayer co-op shooter that definitely challenges players and provide a good thrill. Two thumbs up.
Amazing co-op game - never gets old as new content is always being brought out. Play with strangers or friends and you will have immense fun slashing, shooting, demolishing or burning specimens!

Killing Floor 	Killing floor is a Co-op survival horror game. You have to fend off waves and waves of increasing Zombies and difficulty.you can play up to 6 of your friends with a range of different wepons from a Knife to a Rocket Launcher. There is over 15 maps to play on aswell as some unoffical maps and mods. overall this is a really fun game with it's own risk and reward, great to play with friends and this game could last you quite a while.
The horror is upstaged by over exaggerated British accent whilst  killing varying monsters with/without other players. Better than valve's left 4 dead series? I think so

(Just a small, positive review)

This game is the reason I hopped on Steam almost 4 years ago.
A truly unique experience with perfect teamplay elements!

It has a round-based system in which the game works, you need to survive each round, kill high priority enemies before taking down the smaller ones. And the harder modes would definitely require you to use tactics - which can be ruined by selfish/inept people though.

For each enemy & round you complete, you get money which you can then use at the trader to buy weapons, armor & grenades - they are discounted based on how high your specific class is.

At the end of the round you will fight the Patriarch, a boss that can be quite dangerous if the team doesn't coordinate well or doesn't have the right classes to fight/distract it.

(Also, I made a lot of Steam friends via this game!)

I'd recommend playing Killing Floor before getting Killing Floor 2, since this game was the basis on which Killing Floor 2 was based - which is a great game, in it's own right.

Personal score: 7.5/10

Best regards,

Why don't you already own this game?... If you don't, let me explain its draw. You see, it all started when Horzine's scientists created dangerous mutated clones. An outbreak occured, leading to London being overrun by these creatures and only a small six person force of various police and military to fight the hordes. A few updates later and the infection has spread to the rest of England, and new and intersting (DLC, Promotional, and Holiday) characters ranging from DJs to Welders, Chicken Costume Commandos to Mall Santas have joined to fight.

Hectic combat, interesting characters, cheap DLC, fun events, lots of weapons, varied maps, plenty of achieves, scary monsters. Co-op survival horror at probably its finest. Try fighting off a eight foot tall brick sh!thouse with spinning meatgrinders for hands with nothing but dual Handcannons when your entire team has been wiped, you will cry and run like a b!tch.

Buy this game if you haven't, you won't regret it.
